markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oracular Providence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1510) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 81 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[oracular clarity](/Classes.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

Your mystery grants you access to deep reserves of truly miraculous divine power. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.
name: Oracular Providence
